name: nasa-exoplanet-explorer
description: Interactive 3D visualization tool for exploring NASA exoplanets

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.test: npm test --prefix frontend && npm test --prefix backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix backend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix frontend && npm run format:check --prefix backend
